text: Ha, Mad? Never, never was, never have been and never will be!"

Actually, living as the Husk is not bad at all. Why do I need to reclaim my body when I can smash the enemies in this form?\\n\\nWhy do I need Black Pyramid in the first place? I can make a new one. \\n\\n[[col:red]]Warning: This is a joke event. If you're a new player and don't know what to do, conquer the Black Pyramid of Nagash and hold a ritual there.[[/col]]

You defeated the dirty crown thief. However, frankly speaking, he was a formidable foe. Moreover, he couldn't exploit his full potential because of his stubbornness. While thinking for some time, Nagash decided to make him a Mortarch and even give him a proxy crown to control him.
